qas.question: What movie did Spielberg collaborate with Cruise for?
What was the Rotten Tomatoes rating for Minority Report?
How much did Minority Report earn?
How much did Minority Report earn in the US?
In what year was Philip K. Dicks novel Minority Report published?
What was Spielberg's first move to blend CGI and live-action?

context: <b7_0>Spielberg<b7_0/> and actor Tom Cruise collaborated for the first time for the futuristic neo-noir <a0_0><b8_0>Minority Report<b8_0/><a0_0/>, based upon the science fiction short story written by Philip K. Dick about a Washington D.C. police captain in the year <a1_0>2054<a1_0/> who has been foreseen to murder a man he has not yet met. The film received strong reviews with the review tallying website Rotten Tomatoes giving it a <a2_0>92%<a2_0/> approval rating, reporting that 206 out of the 225 reviews they tallied were positive. The film earned <a3_0>over <b5_0>$358 million<b5_0/> worldwide<a3_0/>. Roger Ebert, who named it the best film of <a4_0><b6_0>2002<b6_0/><a4_0/>, praised its breathtaking vision of the future as well as for the way Spielberg blended CGI with live-action.
